title: Leading games on Twitch as of July 2019 , by hours viewed
summary: This is a bar chart representing Video Game in the x axis and Number of hours in millions in the y axis.
The Number of hours in millions is highest at Video Game Fortnite and lowest at Video Game Apex Legends.
The difference of Number of hours in millions between the highest and lowest Video Game is 20.8.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Video Game in the x axis and Number of hours in millions in the y axis.
Video Game Fortnite has the highest Number of hours in millions and Apex Legends has the lowest Number of hours in millions.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Video Game in the x axis and Number of hours in millions in the y axis.
The Number of hours in millions is highest at Video Game Fortnite and lowest at Video Game Apex Legends.
The difference of Number of hours in millions between the highest and lowest Video Game is 20.8.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours in millions for 10 number of Video Games.
Video Game Fortnite has the highest Number of hours in millions and Apex Legends has the lowest Number of hours in millions.
Video Game League of Legends has the second highest value for Number of hours in millions.
Video Game Fortnite has 6.2 times more Number of hours in millions than Video Game Apex Legends which is has the lowest.
Number of hours in millions at Video Game Fortnite is 24.8 , second place is League of Legends at 13.7, and thirdly is GTA V at 13.1.
Considered together, the average Number of hours in millions in all 10 Video Games is roughly 10.29.
Summing up the values of all Video Games, we get total 102.9.
